com.facebook.buck.cli

Class BuildIdSampler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.cli.BuildIdSampler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.common.base.Function<BuildId,Boolean>

    public class BuildIdSampler
extends Object
implements com.google.common.base.Function<BuildId,Boolean>
    Decides whether a particular BuildId belongs to a sampling group of a supplied size.

      • BuildIdSampler

        public BuildIdSampler(SampleRate sampleRate)
        Parameters:
        sampleRate - value in percent between 0 and 100 inclusive. This decides the probability of a random BuildId belongin to the sample.
